          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy transfer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energieübertragung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transfert d'énergie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transferência de energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasferimento di energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενεργειακή μεταφορά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transferencia de energía</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows three persons transferring different amount of energy while lying down (top), walking (middle) and climbing (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy transformation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flow chart</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fuel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermal</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt drei Personen, welche die 
unterschiedliche Menge Energie beim unten liegen übertragen 
(Oberseite) und geht (Mitte) und klettert (Unterseite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre trois personnes 
transférant la quantité différente d'énergie tout en se couchant 
(dessus), marchant (milieu) et s'élevant (bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra três pessoas que 
transferem uma quantidade diferente de energia ao encontrar-se para 
baixo (alto), andando (meio) e escalando (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra tre persone che 
trasferiscono la quantità differente di energia mentre si trova giù 
(parte superiore), ambulante (metà) e rampicante (parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τρία άτομα που 
μεταφέρουν το διαφορετικό ποσό ενέργειας ξαπλώνοντας (κορυφή), 
που περπατά (μέση) και που αναρριχείται (κατώτατο σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a tres personas que 
transfieren diversa cantidad de energía mientras que se acuesta 
(tapa), recorriendo (centro) y subiendo (fondo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energieübertragung</string>
          </keyword>
